title: /eth/v1/events head returning epoch transition early
body:
# üêû Bug Report `head` events returned from the standard API are displaying the epoch transition early. ### Description The `head` event contains a field `epoch_transition`that should be `true` when the beacon node goes through an epoch transition. This appears to be set earlier than expected. ### Has this worked before in a previous version? No. ## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction curl -N -H 'Accept: text/event-stream' 'http://localhost:3500/eth/v1/events?topics=head' ## üî• Error Sample from prater: 

event: head
data: {"slot":"1332094","block":"0xf932ee3efb5a6ddf7267c7741bba4b2655ef3148d07822fd809cef9dd6bbf88a","state":"0x6b3919d85d2403bc790cd1863f1589ae10555add314b836e8da5cba5ea3d1b67","epoch_transition":false,"previous_duty_dependent_root":"0x5ddd62edc4f2957938e78f691d5911f9af1d8415e0e0f2226e7253d2ec273be1","current_duty_dependent_root":"0x017779cf0eca6125ad4983129b3b44c64aab530d2a0d7b26ddfd9849187cda70"}

event: head
data: {"slot":"1332095","block":"0x7358186892d795eb7fbfc8af05d947f44329a9cce22a6c35efe9c1ebba12ac3c","state":"0x85ff3913bc7b19cb0ac28690bef5038a344387b4fe5d66164fa25a0bd6ab5a21","epoch_transition":true,"previous_duty_dependent_root":"0x5ddd62edc4f2957938e78f691d5911f9af1d8415e0e0f2226e7253d2ec273be1","current_duty_dependent_root":"0x017779cf0eca6125ad4983129b3b44c64aab530d2a0d7b26ddfd9849187cda70"}

event: head
data: {"slot":"1332096","block":"0x680356f854e2b9402d1b3f5ca903e0bfd282d3d6f2582862542257116e68a31b","state":"0x6fed6760d19d8710aa9a5a46ae8e26bb9c4f8cb269fcb28426d9bf8022b2aabd","epoch_transition":false,"previous_duty_dependent_root":"0x017779cf0eca6125ad4983129b3b44c64aab530d2a0d7b26ddfd9849187cda70","current_duty_dependent_root":"0x7358186892d795eb7fbfc8af05d947f44329a9cce22a6c35efe9c1ebba12ac3c"}

event: head
data: {"slot":"1332097","block":"0x9697b3cad1454e95903d40a1b22ca580dded199edd7971801fa67e7569d948cc","state":"0x4d7d33482a589a3ee7205e2f308174eedfaf40e1f1cccd20f7f77995b3a95ea6","epoch_transition":false,"previous_duty_dependent_root":"0x017779cf0eca6125ad4983129b3b44c64aab530d2a0d7b26ddfd9849187cda70","current_duty_dependent_root":"0x7358186892d795eb7fbfc8af05d947f44329a9cce22a6c35efe9c1ebba12ac3c"}
It can be seen that `epoch_transition` is true for slot 1332095, where it should be 1332096 as the latter is the first slot after the epoch transition. This is supported by the fact that the dependent roots are the same in slots 1332094 and 1332095, but have changed in 1332096. ## üåç Your Environment develop
